Rocky is a snack food consisting of a long, thin biscuit dipped in chocolate. Variants exist, such as Strawberry Rocky, which has the chocolate replaced with a strawberry-flavored icing. Its crunchiness, shape, and taste have all contributed to it becoming a very popular food amongst sweet teeth of all ages.

Provides 3 copies of [ICON_RES_PMMM_ROCKY] Rocky, a unique Luxury Resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This building can only be obtained by Kazamino adopting the "Develop Rocky" Decision, or conquering Kazamino's [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital after it has adopted the Decision.
